scripts.compile: node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json; cp $(command -v node) ./build/bin/arave; npx postject ./build/bin/arave NODE_SEA_BLOB ./build/bin/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --overwrite
scripts.install: npm run build; npm run compile
